title: Contemporary Gentlemen Portraits
description: Dive into modernity with the 'Contemporary Gentlemen Portrait Pack'! Explore 400 diverse portraits of men from all walks of life, each available in two sizes.
longDescription:
Discover a world of modernity with our Contemporary Gentlemen Character Portraits pack. This collection is a celebration of the diverse and dynamic roles of men in today's world, offering a wide array of portraits that will enhance and enrich any project.

Within this vast pack, you'll uncover 400 separate portraits, each one carefully crafted to capture the essence of contemporary men. From the ambitious young professional to the wise and seasoned elder, each portrait reflects the multifaceted nature of men in today's society.

To ensure versatility and adaptability, each portrait is available in two sizes: 500x500 and 1000x1000 pixels. This allows you to select the resolution that best suits your needs, whether you are developing a video game, designing a book cover, or creating a piece of art.

In today's interconnected world, it is crucial to celebrate diversity. That's why this collection includes characters from a broad range of ethnicities and ages. Whether you are seeking a portrait of a middle-aged African doctor, a young Asian entrepreneur, or an elderly European musician, you'll find it in this pack.

Each portrait is rendered in PNG format and features a transparent background, making it incredibly straightforward to integrate these images into your projects, regardless of their color scheme or aesthetic. This flexibility ensures that these portraits can be used in a wide array of games, from RPGS to Visual Novels.

Embrace the diversity and dynamism of contemporary men and let their stories inspire and elevate your creations. With 400 separate portraits to choose from, you'll have a wealth of options to bring your projects to life.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  400 portraits in 2 sizes, for a total of 800 images.
  •  Watercolor style fits with many games styles.
  • Background free, allowing adaptation to any environment
  • Diverse collection of characters 

Number of Textures: 800

Texture Resolutions: 1000x1000, 500x500

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation:

Important/Additional Notes: Generated with AI, then edited to remove backgrounds and other tweaks.
